title: Basic Instinct
report: T + 1:10  - feeling quite tired, has relieved any DT's
T + 2:30  - Still feeling it, im notably slower than before. A nice doobie would go down pretty well about now.
T + 4:00  -Mild Effects still felt, felt a little clumsy before
might go lie down for a ciggie and some tv
Went to sleep after smoking a cig.

erowid.citation: Rangi. "Basic Instinct: experience with Triazolam (Halcion) (ID 33499)". Erowid.org. May 27, 2006. erowid.org/exp/33499
